name: Sibanye Stillwater Limited
description: Sibanye Stillwater Limited is a leading precious metals mining company with a diverse portfolio of operations in South Africa and the United States. Founded in 2013, the company has quickly established itself as one of the largest producers of platinum group metals (PGMs) and gold globally. Sibanye Stillwater operates several high-quality mining assets, including the Rustenburg operations and the Stillwater and East Boulder mines in Montana, USA. The company is committed to sustainable mining practices and aims to create long-term value for all stakeholders, including employees, communities, and shareholders. Through innovation and operational excellence, Sibanye Stillwater focuses on maximizing production efficiency while minimizing environmental impacts. The company is also involved in the recycling of precious metals, further enhancing its sustainability initiatives. Sibanye Stillwater's strategic vision includes growth through acquisition, investment in new technologies, and a commitment to improving the economic and social well-being of its host communities. The company actively engages with various stakeholders to ensure responsible mining practices that contribute positively to local economies.
